front.title: •Kessel Run
front.gametext: Deploy on Kessel. Target one of your smugglers at another system. X=parsec distance between the two systems. When target reaches Kessel, opponent draws destiny. If = 0, starship lost. Otherwise, by returning to first system, 'retrieve' X Lost Force.
front.lore: Planet Kessel has infamous glitterstim spice mines attracting smugglers and pirates. A 'Kessel run' is a long, dangerous hyper-route they must travel quickly.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Kessel Run + Ralltiir Freighter Captain + Ralltiir
